name: For This Child Godot Wild Jam #55 Participation
name_original: For This Child Godot Wild Jam #55 Participation
description:
Hi ! Here is the game I made for the Godot Wild jam #55 ! I hope you will like it. 

In this game, you will play as the subconscious of a child, which is trying to help him through his life. 

You will act in his dreams, and your performances during the night will determine how well he will do during the days.

=== Inputs ===

Name: QWERTY KEY / AZERTY KEY

Movement forward: W / Z

Movement left:              A / Q

Movement backward: S / S

Movement right:          D / D

Hit forward:                    U / U

Hit forward-left:           Y / Y

Hit left:                               H / H

Hit backward-left:       N / N

Hit backward:                M / ,

Hit backward-right:      , / ;

Hit right:                            K / K

Hit forward-right:          I / I

Switch Weapon:           J / J

===========

2 versions of the game are available : - The original one - And a Compatibility one in case you can't run the other one

Thank you for your time,
Tremisabdoul
